# Token Position Test Cases
# Format:
#   Line 1: Query text
#   Line 2+: Token annotations in format:
#            ^-
#            value (type) [flags]
#            Where ^ marks the start column and - shows the span
#   Empty line separates test cases
#   Lines starting with # are comments

hello world
^----
hello (word)
      ^----
      world (word)

tag:foo
^------
tag:foo (qualifier)

"hello world"
^------------
hello world (string)

NOT hello
^--------
hello (word) NOT

hello tag:world "test string" NOT bar
^----
hello (word)
      ^--------
      tag:world (qualifier)
                ^------------
                test string (string)
                              ^------
                              bar (word) NOT

created:2022-01-01..2022-12-31
^-----------------------------
created:2022-01-01..2022-12-31 (qualifier)

tag:me k:5 bias:0.01
^-----
tag:me (qualifier)
       ^--
       k:5 (qualifier)
           ^--------
           bias:0.01 (qualifier)

photo tag:sunset "golden hour" NOT dark k:10
^----
photo (word)
      ^---------
      tag:sunset (qualifier)
                 ^------------
                 golden hour (string)
                               ^-------
                               dark (word) NOT
                                        ^---
                                        k:10 (qualifier)

NOT tag:foo NOT "bar" word
^----------
tag:foo (qualifier) NOT
            ^--------
            bar (string) NOT
                      ^---
                      word (word)

a:b c:d:e f
^--
a:b (qualifier)
    ^----
    c:d:e (qualifier)
          ^
          f (word)
